concept.title: About The Sample ePublisher Express Trial Stationery
concept.shortdesc: This trial uses the ePublisher Express Trial Stationery that was created using ePublisher Designer.

conbody.p: The ePublisher stationery is an electronic template that is designed for your specific needs. It acts as your publishing assistant taking your specific instructions and then executing to them every time it delivers content. Every ePublisher Express project is synchronized to stationery. ePublisher Express reads the content from the source documents, gets instructions from the synchronized stationery and then publishes the output.

The stationery for these source documents was created with ePublisher Designer back in the WebWorks lab. ePublisher Designer is for building stationery with customer styles, formatting information, and settings specific to your source documentation. ePublisher Designer also gives you the ability to set specific conditions that apply during the publishing process. The stationeries created by ePublisher Designer are portable, so they are usable with any Express project. Using the ePublisher work flow is how we are providing you with stationery already customized to the source documents for this trial.

During this trial you will be using the pre-built stationery with an ePublisher Express project. After this trial if you feel ePublisher might be the right solution for you, go to the Next Steps section in ePublisher Express to schedule a demo for ePublisher Designer.
